timeline.message: Reserve symbol table resource name and fix request symbol table

timeline.bodyText: Excellent catch! Can you please change this check to checking for scheme instead of startsWith and use the d2 constant please?
timeline.author: karthikrg

replies.bodyText: Also may want to add a debug log here.
replies.author: karthikrg

replies.bodyText: Also can you cleanup the comment from line 237-238? Looks like this was missed inthe previous PR
replies.author: karthikbalasub

timeline.bodyText: This is not sufficient. If a resource has string Keys and if the key is "symbolTable" it can still cause conflict. We might have to revert Sang's commit.
timeline.author: karthikbalasub

replies.bodyText: updated symbol table request to include a header flag to avoid conflict.
replies.author: aman1309

replies.bodyText: do you still need this change?
replies.author: karthikbalasub

replies.bodyText: No, but kept it to avoid confusion
replies.author: aman1309

timeline.bodyText: It needs to be "X-RestLi", Capitalize L
timeline.author: junchuanwang
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -47,6 +47,11 @@
    */
   private static final String ACCEPT_HEADER = "Accept";
 
+  /**
+   * Symbol table request header
+   */
+  private static final String SYMBOL_TABLE_HEADER = "X-Restli-Symbol-Table-Request";

replies.bodyText: HTTP Headers are case insensitive, and h2 actually sends them as lower case. I would suggest lowercasing everything to save some garbage :D
replies.author: karthikrg

timeline.bodyText: why are assuming # of path segments to 2 or 3? I mean the original code seems more natural
timeline.author: junchuanwang

replies.bodyText:
this is reverting to original code, reverts below pr
https://github.com/linkedin/rest.li/pull/465/files

timeline.bodyText: Did you add this back for compatibility with the old logic?
timeline.author: karthikbalasub

replies.bodyText: yes, for older clients using symbol table.
